level.heading: Federally regulated, supervised, and insured entities and the Federal National Mortgage Association and Federal Home Loan Corporation.

level.text: Nothing in subchapter II of this chapter shall be construed to apply to loans made or purchased by the Federal National Mortgage Association, Federal Home Loan Corporation, or a bank, trust company, savings and loan association, or savings bank, that is regulated and supervised by a supervising federal agency, including the finance and operating subsidiaries of such entities that are so regulated and supervised.
This section shall not apply to any lender that is not federally regulated and supervised, except the Federal National Mortgage Association, or the Federal Home Loan Corporation.

Except as provided in subsection (d) of this section, the Home Ownership and Equity Protection Act of 1994, approved September 23, 1994 (108 Stat. 2190; codified in various sections of Chapter 16 of the U.S. Code), and the implementing regulations issued by the Federal Reserve Board, as each may be amended from time to time, are hereby adopted by reference thereto and shall apply to loans made or purchased by the Federal National Mortgage Association, Federal Home Loan Corporation, or a bank, trust company, savings and loan association, or savings bank that is regulated and supervised by a supervising federal agency, including the finance and operating subsidiaries of such entities that are so regulated and supervised, that engage in lending activities in the District.

The violations, remedies, penalties, and enforcement provisions set forth in subchapter III of this chapter shall apply to loans made or purchased by the Federal National Mortgage Association, Federal Home Loan Corporation, or a bank, trust company, savings and loan association, or savings bank that is regulated and supervised by a supervising federal agency, including the finance and operating subsidiaries of such entities that are so regulated and supervised, that engage in lending activities in the District with regard to violations of this chapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 26-1153.01 and § 26-1153.05.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 102 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The "Home Ownership and Equity Protection Act of 1994", referred to in subsec. (c), is Pub. L. 103-325, Title I, Subtitle B, Sept. 23, 1994, 108 Stat. 2190, which is codified to various sections in Chapter 16 of Title 15 of U.S.C.
